name: plasma cell leukemia
definition: A plasma cell neoplasm that is characterized by the presence of a circulating clonal plasma cell count that exceeds 2x10^9/L or is 20% of the leukocyte differential count. [url:https\://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Plasma_cell_leukemia, url:https\://rarediseases.info.nih.gov/diseases/9373/index, url:https\://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC6349791/]

clinicalTrials.title: ECT-001 (UM171) Expanded Cord Blood Transplant to Treat High-risk Multiple Myeloma

therapies.therapyName: Cyclophosphamide + ECT-001 cord blood cells + Fludarabine + Mycophenolate mofetil + Tacrolimus
